title: This project needs to run the postgresql database
description:
We don't want to rely on a external dependency to run the database, this project should be self sufficient and run the database itself.
Make it possible - the user should only need to provide a path (which could also be defaulted) where the database will be stored.
We need to maintain the idea of using the sql files from `docs/sql` that is used in `src/utilsts.ts` inside the function 'readSql'.
